CIPHER.85.cipherString: There is no U-turn in life, what is done, is done, what you have missed, you missed. You can't go back and revisit it
CIPHER.85.question: A quote from Gayatri Gadre has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say?

CIPHER.95.cipherString: Advice is like snow; the softer it falls, the longer it dwells upon, and the deeper it sinks into the mind.
CIPHER.95.question: Solve this Aristocrat of a quote by Samuel Taylor Coleridge.   It ends with the word MIND.

CIPHER.103.cipherString: It doesn't matter where you come from. It only matters where you are and where you want to go.
CIPHER.103.question: Dean Graziosi said the following which has been encoded using the Atbash cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.87.cipherString: The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
CIPHER.87.question: This phrase by Steve Maraboli has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.  What does it say?

CIPHER.88.cipherString: You cannot score a goal when you are sitting on the bench. To do so, you have to dress up and enter the game.
CIPHER.88.question: A quote by Israelmore Ayivor has been encoded as an Aristocrat where you will find the word "YOU" in it three times.

CIPHER.94.cipherString: I know certain truths about life.
CIPHER.94.question: Decrypt this statement from Dana Reinhardt using the Affine cipher with a=7, and b=5

CIPHER.99.cipherString: I'm not much of a math and science guy. I spent most of my time in school daydreaming and managed to turn it into a living.
CIPHER.99.question: George Lucas gives us his background which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.  What did he say?

CIPHER.90.cipherString: I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it
CIPHER.90.question: Sebastian Vettel expressed their opinion on life which has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  It ends with "WARD TO IT"

CIPHER.96.cipherString: Life can't break me, I'm built to be shocks absorber
CIPHER.96.question: A statement by Mohammed Sekouty has been encoded using a Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.100.cipherString: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
CIPHER.100.question: Groucho Marx made this statement about media.  It has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to decode.

CIPHER.93.cipherString: Self-discovery is the key to knowing what to do with your life.
CIPHER.93.question: Sunday Adelaja offers some advice that has been encoded using the Vigenère cipher with the keyword LIFE.

CIPHER.102.cipherString: The world's a puzzle; no need to make sense out of it.
CIPHER.102.question: These strange headlines are a Baconian cipher of a quote by Socrates.  It starts out as THE WO.

CIPHER.105.cipherString: Reading a book is like re-writing it for yourself.
CIPHER.105.question: A quote by Angela Carter has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●–, 2=×●, 4=●×, 5=×–, 6=××, 9=●●

CIPHER.97.cipherString: Kids are really inspired two knot just apply senses two robots and machines, butt two try them on themselves.
CIPHER.97.question: Your friend is trying to share some thoughts by Neil Harbisson encrypted as an Aristocrat, unfortunately they don't spell very well when typing it in.  What does it decrypt to say?

CIPHER.86.cipherString: Si la experiencia es el mejor maestro, no hay nada que se aproxime a la experiencia de la vida.
CIPHER.86.question: A quote by Michael A. Singer has been translated into Spanish and then encoded as an Aristocrat with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  What does it say?
CIPHER.86.translation: If experience is the best teacher, there's nothing that comes close to the experience of life.

CIPHER.98.cipherString: Every detour puts you on the right path for your own success.
CIPHER.98.question: A quote by Avina Celeste has been encoded with the Vigenère cipher using a keyword of WATER.  What was it?

CIPHER.104.cipherString: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
CIPHER.104.question: A quote by Wilson Kanadi has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 0=●, 2=×, 3=–, 7=–, 8=–, 9=×

CIPHER.92.cipherString: Previous journeys in search of treasure have taught me that a zigzag strategy is the best way to get ahead.
CIPHER.92.question: Tahir Shah offers some advice that has been encoded using the Caesar cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.106.cipherString: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
CIPHER.106.question: A quote by the master puppeteer Jim Henson has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3 rails were used to encode it.
